pipelines.name: weld_porosity_classification_mlops
pipelines.pipeline: multifilesrc loop=TRUE location=/home/pipeline-server/resources/videos/welding.avi name=source ! h264parse ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame name=classification ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: weld_porosity_classification_s3write
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame name=classification model-instance-id=inst0 ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! queue ! jpegenc ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: weld_porosity_classification_mqtt
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame name=classification model-instance-id=inst0 ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvawatermark ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! queue ! jpegenc ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: weld_porosity_classification_opcua
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame name=classification model-instance-id=inst0  ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvawatermark ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! queue ! jpegenc ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: weld_porosity_classification_gpu
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! parsebin ! vah264dec ! vapostproc ! video/x-raw(memory:VAMemory) ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame device=GPU pre-process-backend=va-surface-sharing model-instance-id=instgpu0 inference-interval=1 batch-size=8 nireq=2 ie-config="GPU_THROUGHPUT_STREAMS=2" name=classification ! queue ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: weld_porosity_classification_npu
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! parsebin ! vah264dec ! vapostproc ! video/x-raw(memory:VAMemory) ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame device=NPU pre-process-backend=va model-instance-id=instnpu0 inference-interval=1 batch-size=1 nireq=4 name=classification ! queue ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination

pipelines.name: weld_porosity_classification
pipelines.pipeline: {auto_source} name=source ! decodebin ! videoconvert ! gvaclassify inference-region=full-frame device=CPU pre-process-backend=opencv model-instance-id=inst0 name=classification ! queue ! gvametaconvert add-empty-results=true name=metaconvert ! queue ! gvafpscounter ! appsink name=destination
